articles.title: Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Feb. 4)
articles.description:
ABINGTON 89 Andrew Ford Way One-family Cape Cod, built in 1947, 1,932 square feet, 6 rooms, 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, on 18,712-square-foot lot. $720,000 63 Allen St. One-family ranch, built in 1950, 704 square feet, 4 rooms, 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, on 7,000-square-foot lot. $560,000 133 Andrew Ford Way One-family ranch, built in 1958, 2,280 […]

The post Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Feb. 4) appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Abington homes sold include a Cape Cod for $720,000 and a ranch for $560,000.
Recent sales reflect a competitive housing market in Greater Boston as of February 4.
Home prices continue to rise, impacting affordability for Boston residents seeking housing.
